actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

official_title: To extend time limitations on certain projects.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to extend, for a designated period, the time required for specified licensees to commence and complete construction for certain small hydroelectric generation facilities (on the White River, Arkansas), including the acquisition of real property for such facilities.

titles.title: To extend time limitations on certain projects.
